metadata.title: 24 Pieces Kids Western Cowboy Party Hats with Pentagram Straw, Cowboy Straw Hat for Children Kids Boys Girls Decorations Favors Gifts, 12 Assorted Colors
features: Sufficient Quantity: there are 24 pieces of cowboy hats in 12 colors, 2 pieces per color, ample quantities and diverse colors can meet your kid's daily wearing and replacement needs, also can be shared with others

Reliable Material: the western cowboy hats are made of quality straw woven material, adopted double interweaving process of oblique cutting and warp and weft, strong and sturdy, offering you a breathable and comfortable wearing feeling

Distinctive Design: the western straw hat is designed with a short curved brim, which can effectively block the sunshine without obstructing you sight; Decorated with exquisite five pointed star pattern, the hat is full of western cowboys feeling; It is equipped with a windproof rope, which can be easily adjusted according to your size
Proper Size: the kids party hats are about 15 cm/ 6 inch in circumference, 5.5 cm/ 2 inch in brim, and 10 cm/ 4 inch in height, suitable for most kids from aged 3 to 9

Wide Occasions: these straw cowboy hats can be applied for a variety of occasions, including birthday, cowboy theme parties, rodeo theme activities, stage performances, role playing events, fancy dress parties, costume parties, cosplay events, etc., making your kids become the focus of attention
description: Features: The cowboy hats decorations are suitable as nice gifts given to your kids, or your family members and friends who own kids. The children cute straw hats are rich in colors, like pink, purple, black, blue, yellow, brown, green, etc., which can nicely match your children's different clothing.  Specifications: Material: straw woven material Color: as shown in the pictures Size: 15 cm/ 6 inch in circumference, 5.5 cm/ 2 inch in brim, and 10 cm/ 4 inch in height  Package includes: 24 x Kid cowboy hats  Notes: Manual measurement, please allow slight errors on size. The color may exist a slight difference due to different screen displays.

title: Western Cowboy Hat Set, Felt Cowboy Themed Party Hats
